spec_data.Name: ghc-resourcet
spec_data.Description:
Allocate resources which are guaranteed to be released.
All register cleanup actions live in the IO monad, not the main monad.
This allows both more efficient code, and for monads to be transformed.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 03 Aug 2017 02:43:58 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Deterministic allocation and freeing of scarce resources
